#summary Bare minimums for a 1st version
#labels Phase-Requirements

= Feature List =

 * parsing written English into calendar events
 * Info attached to an event (maybe just textbox to write unformated text in? step up to simplified wiki markup à lá googlecode?)
 * emailing (on queue and daily digests)
 * reschedule appointments
 * recurring events
 * tagging (and smart tagging at that - @weekly, @monthly)
 * export to .ics (goodness for google calendar, ical, and all things compliant with RFC 2445)
 * Add events via XMPP messaging (ie. jabber, google talk, etc)
